name: SOS Mission
description:
SOS Mission is a Global Game Jam game and it was made by me and 2 other friends!

I programmed, did some of the art and animated. Most of the art by Luis Marques and Music by Frederico Galvão.

After a help message has been received by you, you venture through the galaxy in an SOS Mission. Beware for other spaceships you may find in the way.

After immobilizing the enemy spaceship, you may eject an invasion ship and use it to enter through the enemy's ship back entry. (yeah, we didn't plan this too well!) When inside you must kill all the enemies and go back to the back of the ship. Mind the drop on the far right, if you fall, there's no way back up!

While in space, use these controls:

  • W and S - Thust
  • A and D - Steer
  • Space - Shoot
  • CTRL/Left Mouse - Eject invasion ship

While invading:

  • WASD - Walk and point
  • Space - Jump
  • CTRL/Left Mouse - Shoot
